mapper.update:
update express_person
exuserName = #{exuserName},
exuserEmail = #{exuserEmail},
exuserPassword = #{exuserPassword},
exuserNickname = #{exuserNickname},
exuserRelateOther = #{exuserRelateOther},
exuserSex = #{exuserSex},
exuserStuno = #{exuserStuno},
exuserStuimageUrl = #{exuserStuimageUrl},
exuserCardID = #{exuserCardID},
exuserCollege = #{exuserCollege},
exuserCampus = #{exuserCampus},
exuserDorbuilding = #{exuserDorbuilding},
exuserDorNo = #{exuserDorNo},
exuserImageUrl = #{exuserImageUrl},
exworkingPlace = #{exworkingPlace},
exworkingTime = #{exworkingTime},
exuserLoginTimes = #{exuserLoginTimes},
exuserState = #{exuserState},
exuserQualityRating = #{exuserQualityRating},
exremainingSum = #{exremainingSum},
exuserYearOrder = #{exuserYearOrder},
exuserMonthOrder = #{exuserMonthOrder},
exuserDayOrder = #{exuserDayOrder},
exuserTotalOrder = #{exuserTotalOrder},
walletID = #{walletID}
where exuserID=#{exuserID}
